meanings.definition: To move by jumping on one foot.
meanings.sent1: The bunny hopped over the log.
meanings.sent2: The frog hopped from lily pad to lily pad.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo hopped happily through the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The basketball player hopped towards the hoop for a slam dunk.
meanings.sent5: The grasshopper hopped gracefully through the garden.

meanings.sent1: The cat hopped off the couch when it heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel hopped across the yard to grab a nut.
meanings.sent3: The child hopped with excitement when they saw the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: The thief hopped over the fence to escape the police.
meanings.sent5: The rabbit hopped out of the bush and surprised the farmer.

meanings.definition: To add hops to beer during the brewing process.
meanings.sent1: The brewer hopped the beer to give it a bitter flavor.
meanings.sent2: The brewery hopped their signature IPA with care.
meanings.sent3: The bartender hopped around the bar, adding hops to each batch.
meanings.sent4: The beer enthusiast hopped with joy when they tasted the perfectly hopped brew.
meanings.sent5: The master brewer hopped from one brewery to another to learn different hopping techniques.
